fields.name: Pinging Staff
fields.value:
Do not ping staff members unless you need their help.  For example, if someone is spamming the server, feel free to ping <@&457281742844330004>.  If you just need the Users role (described below), ping an online staff member; not the entire <@&457281742844330004> role.
​

fields.name: Users Role
fields.value:
In order to upload files/images, embed links, and post reactions, you must have the `Users` role.  In order to obtain this role, just stick around the server for a day or two and show that you can follow the rules above.
​

fields.name: Now join a channel and get chatting!
fields.value:
To join a distro role, head over to <#174317464337776640> and use `sudo listdistro` to list the available distro roles and `sudo joindistro <distro>` to join that role.  You can join as many roles as you like.
​
